overview:
Entrepreneur since 1996, I started by founding a web agency, focused on luxury and public companies website development (SNCF, Celine, JM Weston …). Then I yield the advertising market by lauching an European ad network (Daooda) in 2000 and five years later a media buying agency (Agorad - the first french independant agency in 2007). I sold Daooda and Agorad in 2007.

I just launched my new project : www.ifeelgoods.com Ifeelgoodâ€™s bridges the burgeoning worlds of virtual goods and social games with e-commerce. Through Ifeelgoods, retailers can substitute traditional promotions with virtual goods and virtual currencies that have a lower cost and higher perceived value to customers. The entire process â€“ from seeing the offer to redemption â€“ is seamless to customers. Implementing Ifeelgoods requires very light technical integration.ifeelgoods.com
